attributes.review: I downloaded this app and I was about to put in my information but then I saw a demon in the corner of my room. You might say what does this have to do with the app, well let me tell you. The demon started screaming trump 2020 and wouldn’t stop until I deleted the app off my phone. I will never download anything made by trump again and he will certainly not get my vote this year. Anyways, stan Joe Biden for clear skin🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰.
attributes.title: Terrible Terrible App

attributes.review: I opened up this app to see a man that was not who I expected. I thought that I was getting a kind handsome man but instead I saw an ugly naked Cheeto. I was not happy with the way the app worked either. It lagged everywhere and kept giving me adds for Cheetos. I don’t even like Cheetos. I wasn’t happy with the layout either it was in a weird shape and I could not navigate easily. I rate this 1/10 because it was not worth the download!
attributes.title: Annoyed

attributes.review: Horrible app I saw big Cheeto man with big fat fingers yelling at me. I was so horrified and I closed the app to see the big Cheeto man himself outside of my house with some oranges and said it was his family and so i took the oranges and made him orange juice then cried in front of me so I just ran away because I saw him pull out a girls skirt to wipe his face. Everyone in my neighborhood saw the big Cheeto man become a orange and everyone ate him. The app also gave me a virus called the orange Cheeto virus
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: I hate this app so much. After I clicked install, it took a month to download. Finally when the app opened I was greeted by the big Cheeto man. I got scared and tried to delete it right away, but the app was permanently installed on my phone. I ran to my mom for help, but instead I only found the big Cheeto man in her place. I ran out of my house and am now leaving this review. Help! Give me my family back Cheeto!
attributes.title: This app killed my family

attributes.review: when i first open the app i was horrified of what i seen it was orange look man reading a book i look closer and it said “how to ruin the  world in 4 years” he is up to something and i’m just horrified that he would do something like that then i swiped for a little white seeing some racist people here and there but then i was shooked to see the orange man naked i couldn’t believe my eyes my kids were right next to me, 1 star for sure😑
attributes.title: GHETTO

attributes.review: So I read the reviews and they were bad but like I wanted to download it. Once I downloaded it I saw something that looks like a shrimp.🤮🤮🤮. Then when I looked around in the app I saw his private. My little sisters saw it to and they saw white stuff coming out. It was so disrespectful and disgusting to even think of putting that on the app and to just see that. I’d rather see Karen’s crying than seeing trumps thing .
attributes.title: I saw something disturbing 🤮

attributes.review:
Upon downloading this app I was excited. I was so happy to have another way to connect with cheeto man. But when i opened up the app was devastated. disappointed. shocked. the things i saw. i can’t describe. for everyone’s wellbeing- STAY AWAY. i wouldn’t wish it upon my enemy to have the horrifying experience of being on this app. for your own salvation please stay away. it was obvious that this app has mind controlling abilities beyond human comprehension.
SAVE YOURSELVES
attributes.title: Shocked

attributes.review: I downloaded and immediately deleted it off my phone. As soon as it was downloaded my phone started glitching bad like the app downloaded some type of bug or virus onto my phone. The app itself is poorly made and is way to complex to navigate. I hate this app so much. This app makes me want to throw myself out of a window so I think Apple should take it down for the sake my already horrible mental health.
attributes.title: Worst app ever!!!

attributes.review: this app is spreading false information! FAKE NEWS EVERYONE!!! i don’t recommend this app to anyone because it is just so inaccurate!! it is also asking for way too much information like anyone could easily just take all this info and give it to the chinese government! and we definitely don’t want that to happen! it is tOtAlLy violating my privacy!!
attributes.title: ewwww✨❤️🧚‍♀️😍

attributes.review: at first glance this app may seem like a common app to increase the supporters of our dear pumpkin looking president donald duck. but as i looked into the app a hat stating maga was advertised for sale. a chill went down my spine as i could feel the hairs on my arms lifting. my heart stopped beating and my organs began to shut down one by one. next i saw donald trumps face speaking and i tried to get up and run away but the app grabbed me and paralyzed me with the feeing of disgust and fear at what i was seeing. i am now paralyzed and my eyes are closed as i will never be able to see anything related to this donald trump ever again. this app needs to be taken down for the well being of the humans who use it.
attributes.title: caused me to be paralyzed and mentally unstable
